mapper.update: update sys_menu set deleted_at=now() where id=#{menuId}
mapper.select: select m.id, m.name, m.parent_id, m.level, m.sort, m.icon, m.hidden, m.created_at, m.updated_at from sys_user_role ur inner join sys_role r on ur.role_id = r.id inner join sys_role_menu rm on r.id = rm.role_id inner join sys_menu m on rm.menu_id = m.id where ur.user_id = #{userId}
